radiographic_examinations.findings: The right kidney measures 11.7 cm in length. The left kidney measures 13.5 cm in length. No hydronephrosis is seen bilaterally. No sonographically evident renal stone or mass is seen bilaterally. The renal veins are patent bilaterally. The main renal arteries are also patent bilaterally with brisk upstrokes seen. A right ureteral jet was demonstrated. A left ureteral jet was not seen during the examination. In the region of the pouch/along the inferior edge of the right lobe of the liver, there is a 5.7 x 1.9 x 5.2 cm region of complex avascular fluid, query evolving collection, question hematoma/postop seroma, superinfection cannot be excluded. Trace perihepatic fluid is seen anteriorly. There are likely small bilateral pleural effusions.
